product_name: Dalbello KR 2 Chakra Ski Boots - Womens - 2013/2014
long_description: The women's Dalbello KR Two Chakra ski boots are smooth-flexing divas ready for advanced skiing in any type of snow. Their narrow footbeds and anatomic boot mold precisely dial you into the terrain.
short_description: The women's Dalbello KR Two Chakra ski boots are smooth-flexing divas ready for advanced skiing in any type of snow. Their narrow footbeds and anatomic boot mold precisely dial you into the terrain.
